name: 'Round The World: Platforming Tests
description:
MiKe Adventures: 'Round The World will be a multiple-genre game about a teenager visiting an amusement park on a floating island, where he has to recover 30 lost tickets 'round the world to be able to go deeper and deeper into the mystery of the island of which the park rests.

This test build only contains a portion of the tutorial level, without any prompts, so you must figure out how the basic mechanics work. To help you, I'Ve written the default controls below:

Arrow keys: Move/Navigate Menus

X: Jump

S: Hydro Charge*

C: Crouch**

Enter: Pause

*The Hydro Charge is a 4-directional dash that you charge by holding the S key or what you set as the sub-action 1 key. When you release the sub-action 1 key, you launch in the direction you're pressing. It also lets you bend upwards, downwards, to the left or to the right depending on the direction you dashed.

** You can combine crouching with jumping and the hydro charge for more versatility.

Any amount of feedback is greatly appreciated, you can give feedback on the itch.io community or the following discord server: https://discord.com/invite/aMA6PP9
